thread.title: Dietmar Hamann backs Jurgen Klopp to get the best out of Liverpool crop - Enfield Independent
thread.title_full: Dietmar Hamann backs Jurgen Klopp to get the best out of Liverpool crop - Enfield Independent - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Enfield Independent
title: Dietmar Hamann backs Jurgen Klopp to get the best out of Liverpool crop - Enfield Independent
text:
Jurgen Klopp will fulfil Liverpool owners' Fenway Sports Group's expectations to get better results out of the current squad, according to former midfielder Dietmar Hamann. Negotiations are continuing with the former Borussia Dortmund manager to take over at Anfield with confirmation expected by the end of the week.
 Enfield Independent.
